rating.title: Beema Rating Engine
rating.subtitle: Advanced pricing and risk assessment tools
rating.heroDescription: Leverage advanced algorithms and data analytics to calculate accurate premiums, assess risk factors, and optimize your pricing strategies in real-time.
rating.dynamicPricingDesc: Automatically adjust premiums based on market conditions, loss ratios, and risk profiles
rating.realTimeCalcDesc: Instant premium quotes with sophisticated rating factors and discount structures
rating.riskAssessmentDesc: Comprehensive risk scoring using machine learning and historical data analysis
rating.comingSoonTitle: Full rating engine functionality coming soon
rating.comingSoonDesc: We're working hard to bring you the most advanced insurance rating platform

underwriting.title: Beema Underwriting Workbench
underwriting.subtitle: Comprehensive risk evaluation and policy decisioning
underwriting.heroDescription: Streamline your underwriting process with AI-powered risk analysis, automated referrals, and comprehensive decision support tools for accurate policy evaluation.
underwriting.automatedRiskDesc: AI-driven risk scoring and classification with real-time data validation and fraud detection
underwriting.policyDecisioningDesc: Comprehensive workflows for accept, decline, or refer decisions with audit trails
underwriting.referralMgmtDesc: Smart routing and queue management for cases requiring senior underwriter review
underwriting.comingSoonDesc: Empowering underwriters with cutting-edge tools for faster, more accurate decisions
